column1: Re: CDC COVID-19 test kits: How do you test for a synthetic virus? COVID-19 is not natural in nature. The possibility for misdiagnosis & miscommunication is GREAT w/MSM. As we all know the common cold is a corona virus. Confirming Corona virus or COVID-19? @VP #COVID19 @CDCgov

1/2Who was the dumbass asking what was going to happen to people who were told to stay home from jobs. Because of coronavirus. Hey dumbass, what did people do who stayed home sick with flu? What did people do who was running from hurricanes or floods?
